code: function Validation(values){var error={};if(values.userid===""){error.userid="*Field should not be empty";}else{error.userid="";}if(values.password===""){error.password="*Field should not be empty";}else{error.password="";}if(values.repassword===""){error.repassword="*Field should not be empty";}else{error.repassword="";}return error;}export default Validation;
